page.title: 14POP MUSIC SURVEY
page.content:
Over half the people questioned liked pop music best.A quarter of the people liked classical music a further 25% liked all types of music.The most popular bands are Wham and Duran Duran.1960's music and country and western remain popular. Results based on a survey conducted during June 1985 statistics based on 112 replies.
POP MUSIC - A 12 YEAR OLD'S VIEW
This is July 1985.The pop scene is changing al the time.We have groups that have been in the charts for years,or others that have only just appeared in last few weeks.Then we have the top women such as Tina Turner or Maddona who hit mostly with the men.The top groups such as Duran Duran,Tears for Fears and Wham who hit mostly with girls.
